title: Mobile Microlearning for Core Concepts in Physical Chemistry

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Social domain job-linked education for office/administrative professionals

learning_goals: Learners can prepare energy efficiency calculation reports for chemical processes by applying the First Law of Thermodynamics.
Learners can propose reaction condition optimization plans for industrial settings using reaction kinetics models.
Learners can interpret spectroscopic data, write material property reports, and conduct peer evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
